metadata.title: CVE-2017-7861 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Google gRPC before 2017-02-22 has an out-of-bounds write related to thegpr_free function in core/lib/support/alloc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgrpc++1 - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
libgrpc10 - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
protobuf-compiler-grpc - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
python3-grpcio - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
ruby-grpc - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
ruby-grpc-tools - 1.3.2-1.1~build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grpc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-1.1~build1').
